Tennessee.info: Encourages the sale of coverage products exempt from federal and state rules for individual market insurance
Tennessee.additional: Health plans sold by the Tennessee Farm Bureau are not considered insurance under state law and are exempt from federal and state protections otherwise applicable to the individual insurance market.
